message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. I know it's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget constraint. While I value the product at $18,000, I'm willing to come down to $17,000 to facilitate this deal. It's a fair price considering the product's value and your interest. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. That's the highest I can go.
